source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
ected or confirmed COVID-19 should be managed with supportive
care and consider the immunologic and physiologic adaptations during and after pregnancy.
• Compared to other women of reproductive age with the same exposure risk, pregnant women are not at an
increased risk of becoming infected with COVID-19.
• However, pregnant women who contract COVID-19 are likely to have severe morbidity and mortality, particularly
in the third trimester of pregnancy.
• Follow updated national guidelines on any
